BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: FAMILY SERVICES OF MONTGOMERY COUNTY PA

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: STRENGTHEN THE QUALITY OF LIFE FOR INDIVIDUALS AND FAMILIES IN OUR COMMUNITY.
IRS990.Desc: PREVENTION - SCHOOL BASED, IN-HOME AND COMMUNITY-BASED SERVICES ARE OFFERED AS PREVENTION AND EARLY INTERVENTION PROGRAMS AIMED AT ENHANCING THE QUALITY OF LIFE FOR INDIVIDUALS, FAMILIES AND THE COMMUNITY, AS WELL AS PREVENTING SUBSTANCE ABUSE AND FAMILY/COMMUNITY VIOLENCE.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: EMERGENCY RENTAL AND UTILITIES COALITION (ERUC): ERUC IS DESIGNED TO PROVIDE HOUSING STABILITY TO LOW AND MODERATE INCOME RESIDENTS AT RISK OF EVICTION AND/OR HOMELESSNESS DUE TO COVID-19.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: PROJECT HOPE: PROVIDES SERVICES TO THOSE INFECTED WITH OR AT RISK FOR HIV/AIDS. THE SERVICES AVAILABLE FROM PROJECT HOPE ARE: HIV ANTIBODY TESTING, CASE MANAGEMENT, PREVENTION EDUCATION, HOUSING, TRANSPORTATION, NUTRITIONAL EDUCATION, AND BEHAVIORAL HEALRTH COUSELING.

ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: HELPING ELDERLY ADULTS REMAIN IN THEIR HOME (HEARTH) - THIS PROGRAM IS DESIGNED TO PROVIDE IN-HOME SERVICES TO FRAGILE ELDERLY ADULTS LIVING IN THE GREATER POTTSTOWN AREA.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE AGENCY'S ENDOWMENT CONSISTS OF TWO DONOR-IMPOSED RESTRICTED ENDOWMENTS WHICH ARE INCLUDED IN THE ACCOMPANYING STATEMENT OF FINANCIAL POSITION AT THE FAIR VALUE OF THE UNDERLYING INVESTMENTS. ONE ENDOWMENT CONSISTS OF AN INVESTMENT, THE INCOME FROM WHICH IS EXPENDABLE TO SUPPORT COUNSELING SERVICES. IN THE SECOND ENDOWMENT, THE AGENCY IS AUTHORIZED TO EXPEND, IN ANY FISCAL YEAR, UP TO 5% OF THE TOTAL VALUE OF THE FUND AS DETERMINED ON THE LAST DAY OF THE PRIOR FISCAL YEAR. THE FUNDS ARE AUTHORIZED TO BE EXPENDED FOR THE PURPOSE OF CARE FOR THE ELDERLY AND PROGRAMS IN SUPPORT OF IMPROVED FAMILY LIFE.

THE AGENCY IS EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL INCOME TAXES UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE (IRC). THE AGENCY IS ALSO EXEMPT FROM COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA TAXATION. ACCORDINGLY, NO PROVISION FOR FEDERAL AND STATE INCOME TAX IS INCLUDED IN THE ACCOMPANYING FINANCIAL STATEMENTS . THE AGENCY FILES FEDERAL FORM 990. WITH FEW EXCEPTIONS, THE AGENCY IS NO LONGER SUBJECT TO U.S. FEDERAL OR STATE AND LOCAL INCOME TAX EXAMINATIONS BY TAX AUTHORITIES FOR YEARS BEFORE 2018. IT IS DIFFICULT TO PREDICT THE FINAL TIMING AND RESOLUTION OF ANY PARTICULAR UNCERTAIN TAX POSITION. THE AGENCY DOES NOT CURRENTLY ANTICIPATE SIGNIFICANT CHANGES IN ITS UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS OVER THE NEXT 12 MONTHS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART III, LINE 1, DESCRIPTION OF ORGANIZATION MISSION:
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FAMILY SERVICES OF MONTGOMERY COUNTY, PENNSYLVANIA (THE AGENCY) IS A PRIVATE NONPROFIT MULTI SERVICE AGENCY SERVING MONTGOMERY COUNTY RESIDENTS SINCE 1900. THE AGENCY IS COMMITTED TO STRENGTHENING THE QUALITY OF LIFE FOR INDIVIDUALS, FAMILIES, AND THE COMMUNITY BY PROVIDING PREVENTATIVE INTERVENTION AND ESSENTIAL SUPPORT DURING TIMES OF NEED FOR CHILDREN, ADULTS AND THE ELDERLY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 4
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THERE WAS A CHANGE THIS YEAR THAT GAVE SIGNING AUTHORITY TO THE CEO AND THE ASSISTANT SECRETARY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE 990 IS PREPARED BY OUR INDEPENDENT AUDITORS AND REVIEWED BY THE CEO AND DIRECTOR OF FINANCE OF FAMILY SERVICES. THE BOARD FINANCE COMMITTEE DISCUSSED THE PROCESS AND COMPLETION OF THE 990 AT THE FEBRUARY 2023 MEETING. THE FINAL VERSION OF THE 990 IS AVAILABLE TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS UPON REQUEST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION PROVIDES THE BOARD WITH THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY ANNUALLY. THE ORGANIZATION ALSO REVIEWS THIS POLICY WITH STAFF AT PERIODIC STAFF MEETINGS. ANY MEMBER WITH A CONFLICT WOULD HAVE TO RECUSE THEMSELVES IN ANY APPROVAL OF THAT MATTER.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE REVIEWS THE CEO'S SALARY WITH COMPARABILITY DATA SUPPLIED BY OUR NATIONAL ASSOCIATION AND REGIONAL SOURCES. THE CEO ALSO USES COMPARABILITY DATA SUPPLIED BY OUR NATIONAL ASSOCIATION AND REGIONAL SOURCES TO DETERMINE OTHER MANAGEMENT AND STAFF COMPENSATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: AVAILABLE FOR REVIEW AT THE ADMINISTRATIVE OFFICE AND BY MAIL.
